Reviews.Title: Excellent expansion of the Uniden G755 system (digital spread spectrum)
Reviews.Author: Pragmatic
Reviews.Content: The first question is why doesn't the G755 system come with four (4) cameras to begin with? That said, these CG45/CG45W cameras are importantly, fully-compatible with the FHSS (Frequency-hopping spread spectrum) G755 system (unlike other older, less costly non-FHSS Uniden RF cameras).The two cameras that come with the G755 system are pre-paired for you at the factory but you will have to pair any supplementary cameras to your system yourself - no big deal. From pairing camera screen, tap image 3 or 4 (1& 2 are pre-paired as mentioned earlier), then during 60 second count down, press the pairing button on the new un-paired camera. Repeat for the fourth camera as applicable.Amazon note: The only reason we rated this as a four (4) vice five (5) is that Amazon restricts the purchase quantity on some items. We had two G755 systems and needed a total of four (4) supplementary cameras (two each).  We were restricted to three (3) white cameras and had to wait over a week to order the fourth and final CG45W camera a major inconvenience for us. We recommend Amazon modify this policy by implementing a timely appeals/exception process, and/or possibly consider excluding Prime members from these restrictions.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Camera
Reviews.Author: dacop
Reviews.Content: Camera works as intended.  I purchased it as an "add-on" for my existing Uniden system purchased at Sams Club.  The problem with the Uniden system is that there is no option for "overwriting" the file on the SD card...it fills up and no more recording.  I wish it had the capability to "loop" record.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Wireless Surveillance
Reviews.Author: Bertie Shirley
Reviews.Content: We installed our new Uniden equipment over a month ago (very easy installation), and we have 4 outdoor cameras attached.  The color and the sound on the monitor are excellent. Night vision is outstanding!  You can increase the size of the picture for any camera just by touching the screen; the larger picture holds for about 2 minutes and then readjusts to show the 4 separate cameras. This was a replacement for an older home security system and we are very satisfied.  The only thing we would change would be the ability to manually keep a larger picture up for longer than 2 minutes (right now need to touch the screen at each 2 minute interval---- not a deal breaker though).

Reviews.Title: Uniden G45 camera review
Reviews.Author: Steven G. Conover
Reviews.Content: Works very well except range estimates are optimistic. 75 feet through 3 walls and it's pretty well 1 bar reception. They do tell you this in instructions an sometimes a slight relocation can allow it to pick up signal better..

Reviews.Title: John H. Miller III
Reviews.Author: John H. Miller III
Reviews.Content: Works great, reception weak through walls.  Range from outside house about 80 to 100 feet rather that 500 advertised.  Overall satisfied

Reviews.Title: DON'T GET SCAMMED!
Reviews.Author: Leonard J Sager
Reviews.Content: 1.  If the bad guy finds the unit and steals or smashes it, you have NO record of the recordings.  It will NOT store them on the Internet!  You can only watch real-time on the Internet!2. Solve this by hiding the unit but then you lose the range between the unit and the cameras because the antenna isn't open and exposed!3. Someone has to enter your house and re-format the disk - it will not continually overwrite so when it's full, it stops recording.  That means if you go on a week's vacation, you only get a few days of recording and then NOTHING.4.  The above 3 points make this pretty useless in my opinion!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful system
Reviews.Author: Sheila_fw
Reviews.Content: The Uniden G755 security system I bought came with two cameras and the ability to use four, so I ordered two more.  I am thoroughly  pleased with the cameras,  Plug into electricity and easy mount you have it, that easy.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertised
Reviews.Author: Benjamin E. Rosenberg
Reviews.Content: This camera unit is expected to be added to an already existing main unit. The main unit comes with 2 cameras and this product is an additional camera. Setup is very easy.

Reviews.Title: great cameras
Reviews.Author: Armando Zapanta Jr
Reviews.Content: these cameras are great. i though i was not going to like the white (since the black was on backorder), but i was able to use the white outside where they matched the trim of the house. i was concerned that the picture would not be that good due to the camera being wireless. but i am pleasantly surprised. the picture is better than the cameras that came with a home security system that i had.....even in low/no light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Great system for a budget price
Reviews.Author: Donald E. Reilly
Reviews.Content: We started with the base and two cameras from Costco and bought 2 more cameras on Amazon.  Setup was relatively easy.  We can view any of the four from a remote PC or from my Droid phone.  It's really cool to see the water conditions live from the camera at the back of the beach house.  The waves make the motion sensor go off so we have that one tuned to not record.  Each camera's sensitivity can be adjusted individually.  You can keep the monitor next to your bed at night and recharge it during the day.  The infrared works great at night, changing black clothing to white.  Working with the recordings is best done by removing the chip and plugging it into your PC.  Contrary to previous post, when you view the recordings on your PC, they are grouped by day and each is tagged with the time.  You can delete an entire range of times or days with a few key strokes.  I bought a $4 USB card reader that I plug into my laptop to view the recordings.Yes, we get a lot of recordings of snow fall and stuff like that but we are thrilled with this system for the price.

Reviews.Title: Be sure to adjust the sensitivity.
Reviews.Author: amazonfan
Reviews.Content: These cameras work great overall. However, they are very sensitive as set from the factory. Our memory card filled up quickly at first and upon further investigation we discovered there was a very fine spiderweb in front of the lens. This was triggering the motion detector. We knew that we'd never be completely rid of the spiderwebs so we adjusted the sensitivity and they have worked great since then.

Reviews.Title: Camera works great if you are watching at home but don't plan on using them when away!
Reviews.Author: Mark T Hamilton
Reviews.Content: This camera system is impossible to view on smart phones like advertised unless you are at home using your router with your phone and the camera system.  Bought system due to advertising use of smart phone etc.  Suppose to be able to view when away on a Uniden web site but you have to down load a few programs and use a specific browser.  Still have not been able to view cameras on the web.  A couple of calls to Uniden for support didn't help and the support personnel where not very helpful and gave the perception I was a bother.  System works great at home but not what I wanted it for.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't need a month service
Reviews.Author: William E Burks
Reviews.Content: This Camera is wonderful and you don't need a monthly service contract.  You just down load an app on your smart phone or tablet.

Reviews.Title: 2 cameras operated perfectly, right out of the boxes
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Kellim
Reviews.Content: Received 2 new cameras as ordered, in protective packaging, and right on the date that was promised. Both cameras operated perfectly, right out of the boxes, paired to my Uniden Guardian (2 camera) Surveillance System, to complete a 4 camera system. These wireless color cameras are compact and light weight. Each came with a mounting pedistal, AC/DC power adapter and Operator's Manual. They were easy to install and adjust to view my outside target areas. I'm now relieved to know that these cameras(with motion sensors) will record both color video and audio(day & night) and be a deteriant to tresspassers.

Reviews.Title: Surveilance Cameras
Reviews.Author: Michael Rodin
Reviews.Content: The cameras perform as advertised. The specs rate them as 480i & the clarity is good when subjects are moving slowly, like walking, however with fast movement the subjects are blurred. For home surveilance on the outside this camera is adequate, seeing people walking to the front door & also in the back.I would recommend this camera to anyone who needs viewing with reasonable movement, but not for action viewing.

Reviews.Title: Quality Product
Reviews.Author: sww
Reviews.Content: Delivery was quick.  Packaging was good, Installation very easy.  Mounted 3 cameras so we could have a live visual on our house when we are away.  Works very well with our I phone, picture clarity is excellent.

Reviews.Title: connect to base monitor is lost all the time
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I have two other cameras and this one was an add on to the system. This camera looses the wireless connection to the base unit for 5 minutes every hour. The original cameras never lose connection.

Reviews.Title: Added camera
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Bought this as an additional camera for my Uniden system.  Quick delivery, and item is as described. Extremely easy and fast pairing to the receiver. Daylight images are clear with good color, however the infrared night vision does give a 'ghost' effect of any thing as it gets closer to the camera, but the brightness can be adjusted to compensate with some loss of the field of view.Good started security system for a home or small business.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use - if imperfect system.
Reviews.Author: Scott D. Nelson
Reviews.Content: The Uniden system is imperfect.  The memory card does not rewrite automatically when full, it does not integrate easily with other security/camera systems.That said, it is one of the easiest to set up.  It does exactly what it says.  It's motion detection is good.  Infrared is decent.  Pairing cameras is so simple is silly.So, if you want a dedicated camera system of up to four cameras and don't mind reformatting the damn memory card every few days - this is a reasonable value and very easy DIY.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Bernice Tanker
Reviews.Content: I bought two extra cameras to interface with the Uniden System that I already had.  The cameras came very quickly and we were able to install them  with no problem.

Reviews.Title: Pairs with Guardian G766 surveillance system
Reviews.Author: The Mayor
Reviews.Content: This camera pairs with a G766 system You can not use the UDWC25 cameras!!  Keep in mind the further you put the cameras away from the monitor, you will lose the  clarity of pictures. Try your camera first before you permently  mount them. I would recommend this CG45w camera. Easy pairing, durable housing , and great color!

Reviews.Title: Great protection
Reviews.Author: Lady Di
Reviews.Content: Purchased two more of these cameras as addition to set with main unit we purchased previously.  We have some crappy neighbors who think they can do whatever they want to cause problems, so we installed the system to protect ourselves and provide evidence of wrong doing.  The clarity great and so is the color video these cameras offer.  Fairly easy to install, though it would be nice to have the option of having some shorter mounting brackets.  The ones that come with the cameras are too long for our purposes, so we had to purchase shorter brackets from a electronic gadget chain that has a local location.  We researched a lot before purchasing the system and these cameras offer the best features for the money--as they also include motion sensing and night vision abilities.  We have not found this great camera offered elsewhere for less.

Reviews.Title: Uniden review
Reviews.Author: Franz Sieverding
Reviews.Content: Camera is ok but camera recording is to sensitive regardless of the setting. A snow flake will set it off or change in light and so on.

Reviews.Title: The Uniden camera arrived on time and in perfect shape.
Reviews.Author: Richard Parker, Jr.
Reviews.Content: These cameras were purchased to finis out my Guardian security system for my home. Two cameras are inside to monitor a stairway and home electronics the others monitor the from door and garage. My display unit is up on the forth floor of my condo/townhouse so the range was a challenge for one of the cameras. I'd read other reviews where there were some complaints about lose of signal and have a suggestion that may resolve the problem for others as it did for me. The gain of the antennae that come with the camera may be too low for some installations; signals traveling through walls/metal air ducts degrade rapidly and reduce range. I swapped the antenna on the farthest camera with a higher gain wifi antenna and the problem is gone for that camera and the signal load to receive the others is reduced as well; four solid pictures. Radio Shack or Amazon has them.

Reviews.Title: Works like stated by manufacturer
Reviews.Author: OhioMoose
Reviews.Content: Ordered two of these cameras to go along with a Uniden Guardian system I had purchased from amazon previously.The cameras came quickly, as I have come to expect from amazon. The cameras paired with the system within seconds. Four screwsto mount the cameras, an electrical connection, and there you are, you have added a camera to your system.Camera is clear and night vision works better than I expected. Can't think of anything negative to say about them except thatthe distance the camera can be away from the monitor is a little overated by Uniden.

Reviews.Title: security camera for home
Reviews.Author: a landrum
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 cameras.  The two outside in the elements lasted about 9 months.  Costco replaced no problem.  the 2 indoors work fine, no rain or sun to hamper their performance.Tony

Reviews.Title: G955 is a great small surveillance system and the GC45 cameras, though not HD, give pretty acceptable image quality
Reviews.Author: Sam's Dad
Reviews.Content: I got two of these cameras to pair with the G955 two-camera system. (Uniden Guardian G955 Wireless Security  I was pleased with the ease of setup on the G955 system and cameras.  Unlike reviews I saw for other or earlier systems, I CAN recognize people and critters in the no-light IR mode.  I have nine cats and can recognize every one of them on the monitor when they are recorded in the dark.  I could easily recognize my wife from some distance, also in the dark.  Distance thus far has been up to about 20 feet.  If you know the being you're viewing, you will be able to recognize them in the dark.  If you don't know who it is, someone who knows them will recognize them.Therefore, I went ahead an got two more cameras to bring the monitor up to its full four camera capacity.  The only issue I had with setup was pairing the two new cameras with the existing system.  You have to follow the G955 Owners Manual NOT the instructions that come with the GC45 camera (to answer questions asked by other buyers, the GC45 IS the camera that comes with the G955 monitor.)  To pair the cameras with the monitor, you have to begin the pairing on the monitor's camera pairing screen, then you have 60 seconds to get to the camera and press the "Pairing" button on the camera power cord.  If you do this, your camera will pair perfectly.  But, that process is not written in any of the instructions.Video is recorded in two-minute increments clearly identifying which camera the segment is from.  You can fast-forward through each segment.  All of this helps narrow down your search for a particular segment (I've done this three times already) and saves a lot of time.  The cameras go into sleep mode when there is no motion which also save time finding a desired video segment.  You can set the recording to overwrite old video clips so you don't run out of space on the Micro SD card.Overall, the G955 is a great small surveillance system and the GC45 cameras, though not HD, give pretty acceptable image quality.  I haven't owned it very long, but I was happy enough with it to go out and buy two more cameras to bring it up to full capacity!

Reviews.Title: Piece of cake
Reviews.Author: Randy R
Reviews.Content: So after reading a number of "not so good" reviews on wireless cameras I took the plunge and bought the Uniden Guardian G755 System (it comes with two cameras).  I am extremely happy with this product and immediately purchased a third camera.  It was easy to install and worked correctly the first time.  I have these cameras mounted outside my home.  The only challenge was getting power to them.  The wireless range is decent. Just keep the number of walls & floors between the camera and the receiver to a minimum.  I also purchased a 32g SD card (the system comes with a 4g card).  Overall I am very happy with this system.

Reviews.Title: PLEASED!
Reviews.Author: Bec - CPA
Reviews.Content: So pleased with this camera and the set-up. Easy and works perfectly! We are enjoying the photo shots! Very happy with the transaction.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: ULA
Reviews.Content: ITS VERY EASY TO USE, VERY PRACTICAL, VERY GOOD DEFINITION, THE APP IS PERFECT TO USE WHEN YOUR NOT AT HOME. I RECOMENDED IT.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price
Reviews.Author: trompeta
Reviews.Content: Great video during the day, night video is fair. Easy to pair with existing system & very good motion sensor. Really like having the camera available in white.

Reviews.Title: Works exceptionally well for the price
Reviews.Author: Blackdogg0
Reviews.Content: Works exceptionally well with some precautionary measures to keep it from getting wet and a cheep plastic shoebox works well but for the price i'm very happy with this product

Reviews.Title: Great surveillance for the money but wireless range could be better.
Reviews.Author: Ron Zenobi
Reviews.Content: I like these cameras a lot.  They are easy to set up and work very well even in rough weather.  I do think the wireless range could be a bit better.  The instructions say to place receiver near a window but this is usually not practical.  When two or more walls are between the camera and receiver the signal drops off dramatically.  I found a location for the receiver that had the best overall reception for all cameras and ran ethernet cable to that location.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: T-Rex
Reviews.Content: Bought two cameras to supplement the two that came with the original set.  Like the wireless feature and they are truly "plug and play".  Connected them to power and paired them with the monitor one time and have had no issues with the weather.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!!
Reviews.Author: Michael A Gerety
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up, great video.  The ap works pretty good on my iPhone.  Won't work on pc's/laptops running at 64 bit.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: T. Boss "theotherboss"
Reviews.Content: I very well made camera.  My only comment is that you get a "halo" around the picture if its near a light source.  Also they will not work behind glass looking out.  The little lights, while not visually on, do reflect in the glass.

Reviews.Title: Super simple installation
Reviews.Author: W. Joel Porter "handyman carpenter"
Reviews.Content: I purchased two additional cameras to expand the Guardian Wireless Surveillance system I had previously purchased.  The installation of the camera is just a matter of locating an available power source and then mounting the camera bracket and pairing it to the monitor.  Litterally a matter of minutes.  The image quality is pretty good and it does a great job of "seeing" in low light. The fact that this is wireless and that I don't have to run cable from the base unit to the camera is a great plus.  I would give it five stars if there was a greater range of sensitivity settings and the ability to review recorded video remotely.

Reviews.Title: Poor signal..
Reviews.Author: David C. Dannelly
Reviews.Content: Worked fine during setup...but the signal strength at on ly 300 feet is so bad that vidoe comes and goes......I will replace these soon with hard wired cameras.  WISH I could still send them back.....

Reviews.Title: It is a quality product.
Reviews.Author: Ken Lund
Reviews.Content: My wife installed it while I was on a business trip.  The connectivity and resolution are fine.  I think a larger screen for older eyes would be good.  Some of the reviews speak of range and resolution... our experience is these are both adequate.  The online smartphone app leave a little to be desired.  It works but is not as idiot proof as most commonly used apps today.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras, minor issues.
Reviews.Author: M. Flemming "Mattflemz"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the "starter" system from Costco which comes with the tablet and two security cameras.  I purchased a second pair for the system (the table can "talk" to four cameras) just to have them for future expansion.  We simply have one watching the backyard and on watching the front porch.  These cameras (and the system overall) are very good!  While the camera-to-tablet range is not great, the clarity of video is excellent.  The cameras themselves are a pretty sensitive to motion so you might not want to utilize the email-alert option of the system.  Anyway, my most rambling review...  I do recommend these cameras, and particularly the security system, to anyone purchasing a first system and wanting to perform the installation theirselves.

Reviews.Title: Can you see me now?
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I purchased the uniden camera system and needed two more cameras.  They work well in the dark.  I love that I can watch my home when I  am away.  I liked it so much that I bought another camera  system and of course needed two more  cameras.  They are durable.  The signal  doesn't reach far, maybe 75 feet from  base.  I just wished the phone app had  sound like the base so that I could hear what is going on in or outside my home.  Easy to install.

Reviews.Title: ok for warmer weather
Reviews.Author: Karen Gilewski
Reviews.Content: It does not work when the temp goes below 20 degrees, so this winter it became useless most of January and February.  Should have researched the operating temperature limits before purchase.  Otherwise it works fine with a nice picture.

Reviews.Title: doesn't have good range
Reviews.Author: Barbie58
Reviews.Content: The monitor just circles and circles while trying to pick up the camera feed. While I like having the app on my iphone, most of the time it won't allow us to see the driveway while we are in the lower level of our own home, and we have wifi.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: Harvey Lee
Reviews.Content: We bought the system that came with two cameras, bought these two cameras to have four recording and have total coverage. Took only a few minutes to have them connect to our existing system. Great picture and easy to install, all you need is a power for the camera, don't have to run a cable all the way to the system for video. Would recommend this system to anyone wanting a easy to install security system. Cameras look very high end too.

Reviews.Title: Video Survellance Carmera.
Reviews.Author: Emma
Reviews.Content: This surveillance camera works wonders and it's good when you are away from home the best features that it has is that you can monitor your home while you are away on your tablet or cell phones..I would recommend this surveillance equipment to those who work long hours and for those who have babysitters. It's a product in which is worth your money and a good way to keep watch over your property,  business and home. Excellent quality.

Reviews.Title: Purchased the 2 extra cameras
Reviews.Author: E. Adams
Reviews.Content: This works great.. Just as it says.  We now have 4 cameras set up around our home and love it.

Reviews.Title: Product ok not perfect. Customer service poor
Reviews.Author: christina sanes
Reviews.Content: At times accessing camera activity remotely is not reliable. At times the cameras are overly sensitive and triggered by snow, wind, rain, etc.Absolutely CANNOT reach ANYONE in customer service within a reasonable waiting time on hold. That is a BIG disappointment.

Reviews.Title: SEE AND HEAR...NO EVIL FOR SURE AROUND YOUR PROPERTY!!
Reviews.Author: Cliff L. Steele
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THE 2 PAC SET SOME TIME AGO WHICH INCLUDED THE 7'' MONITOR SCREEN. ADDED ONE MORE FOR A BLIND AREA.THESE UNITS ARE OUTSTANDING!! SEE IN THE DARKNESS AND CAN ALSO HEAR!!A EXCELLENT PRODUCT AND VERY REASONABLY PRICED!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Breeden
Reviews.Content: The camera is wireless, has night vision, and the picture is clear and in color. It is very easy to hook up and pair to the unit.

Reviews.Title: Easy Security Cameras even for Someone Not Technologically Adept.
Reviews.Author: P. Hradkowsky "Paleo Dog Lover"
Reviews.Content: We bought two more cameras to go with our system because we have been so happy with the Uniden system.  The cameras were very easy to pair with the base unit, and so far they are working flawlessly with the other two cameras.

Reviews.Title: Security
Reviews.Author: Charles Brown
Reviews.Content: This gives me added security on my property and it is so easy to set up. Now I have piece of mind knowing I can see outside and record any thing that happens.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade to my system
Reviews.Author: Glenn DeVolder
Reviews.Content: I was glad to be able to find extra cameras for my system, and the quality is outstanding and I would recommend them to anyone

Reviews.Title: Uniden Weather Proof Video Surveillance Camera - Black (GC45)
Reviews.Author: Chi-chi
Reviews.Content: This camera performed flawlessly, as expected, out of the box. It was easy to install, but the power cord was not long enough. I also wish the Wi-Fi transmitter had more range, but all in all it was a good purchase and I would do it again.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install and work with G766 System
Reviews.Author: Lazaro
Reviews.Content: I have a G766 System previosly with two camaras and integrate the third one with no problem at all. In just minutes you have it working.

Reviews.Title: So far, I'm impressed with the Uniden Guardian Surveillance Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jon B.
Reviews.Content: Based on 3 previous exact cameras purchased some time ago, I like the product.  However, I still haven't connected the most recent camera.  I will connect it next week, about Aug. 21.  After that date, I will advise you of my complete satisfaction.  J.B.

Reviews.Title: GREAT...
Reviews.Author: BusyMom
Reviews.Content: Needed additional cameras and these worked out for me. I purchased 2 and set up was as easy as the original ones that came with the set I had purchased. Packaging is well done and time of arrival good. If I need more I will be back.

Reviews.Title: love my uniden cameras
Reviews.Author: KelTex
Reviews.Content: These cameras are so easy to set up. They have great quality if video and sound.  I wish they were a little more clear when recording a fast moving object,  like a kid running,  but I do enjoy the ease of use and simplicity of getting the online viewing setup.

Reviews.Title: Good security camera
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I purchased the security system at Costco that came with only two cameras, the system expands to four cameras, so I ordered two and now have 4 camera security system located strategically around house, has good picture quality great night vision. I would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera's
Reviews.Author: Sheri P.
Reviews.Content: Thank you for great service, and for being so prompt, we really like the camera's they are an addition to the system we already have in place

Reviews.Title: Feedback on Uniden surveillance cameras
Reviews.Author: John R.
Reviews.Content: Cameras work well....unfortunately, at night, faces are too "grainy" to recognize from more than 15 -20 feet away.  During the day time, however, the recordings are wonderful.  I'd still recommend it for use at night because you still know what's going on wherever cameras are recording.

Reviews.Title: Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary J. Kuehn
Reviews.Content: Have bought 3 others and all are the same, great video, great night vision and easy set up.  To sensative and records way more than needs to.  Even on low motion, picks up bugs, plants and trees blowing in the wind.  Also worthless at night if you have them inside pointing out a window.  Glare from the inferred blocks anything that may need to be recorded.

Reviews.Title: Power supply
Reviews.Author: Ray Reinitz
Reviews.Content: The only drawback is you Must use the power cord included with the camera. Other then that it has meet all expectations.

Reviews.Title: Excellent item for price, ease of installation and access via smartphone and/or iPad
Reviews.Author: 2011 F450
Reviews.Content: We purchased several of the complete, Uniden Guardian 2-camera Kits at Costco when they were on sale a few weeks ago. Must have been a good price, because several stores in our area sold out within days.I had the system up an running in no time. Only snag was not being able to view remotely, so I called Uniden's helpline (some people complain about long waits, but I got a human within 30 seconds every time) and was told I hadn't yet instructed the monitor to connect to the Internet - a simple task with the touch screen. (Instructions are for other people!) That done, my wife and I were 'in' and we can now view our property from our smartphones/iPad anywhere there's 3G.We then wanted to expand our camera coverage, so when the price of these cameras dropped this week, that was my que... Adding another 2 cameras was a cinch, and now we have the maximum of 4 cameras for each system.This camera has excellent resolution with wide-angle viewing and minimal distortion. The infrared capability at night is absolutely amazing... IR turns things black & white, but when it's pitch dark inside my shop, I can make out all my tool boxes, etc. and can even see the red light blinking on my wall phone 30 feet from the camera.This is my first Surveillance System, so I have nothing to compare it to, but considering the picture quality and everything in my title, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A great addtion to my system
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: This product is top rated in my book.  I purchased two to complete the Uniden Guardian Security System.  The only downside is the SD card has to be taken out and downloaded to my PC.  Uniden should have added a connector to either USB, Ethernet, or wireless to automatically download to a folder on my PC.The docking station connects to display images to a remote device (Droid Razr and Motorola Zoom Tablet). The display is like having a tablet (walking around the house or outside), nice to go from room to room for checking the system.Very good quality, images exceeded my expectations.I would still recommend this system to anyone.

Reviews.Title: A wonderful addition to my system
Reviews.Author: Mary L. Barrow "maryinredding"
Reviews.Content: We bought the main system from Costco but they did not have additional cameras. I found this camera here at a reduced price. It works great. The picture is clear. I would buy another one in the future if I needed one.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend !!
Reviews.Author: Leonard M
Reviews.Content: Really really pleased with this cam...  surpassed my expectations!easy to set up and connect to internet..  awesome! id  recommend this to anyone needing an inexpensive camera!

Reviews.Title: Easy setup work great
Reviews.Author: Frank D Morris
Reviews.Content: Works great but not real good for  long  distant shots like over 200 feetbut I have two systems and happy with both.. Easy  setuphappy with amazon purchase as well.

Reviews.Title: Uniden GC45 Camera
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Works great.  Video is very high quality for a wireless unit.  Camera was easy to install.  Highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Troy G
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to add to my security system.  It was easy to pair, took a few seconds, and completes my set.  Definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: outstanding camera
Reviews.Author: KJK
Reviews.Content: I now have 4 of these and the quality is top notch. Excellent range and amazing night vision.  Plug and play easy.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Bob James
Reviews.Content: I installed the Uniden system just after Christmas and just added the 3rd camera.  GC45 connected with no problem on the the first pairing.

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Hippiegirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this for home security and it meats all expectations. I little expensive but worth the $. The audio makes all the difference. It picks up sounds I wouldn't have expected. I would recommend this item to anyone looking to increase security.

Reviews.Title: Looks Good
Reviews.Author: Kenneth B Campbell
Reviews.Content: Camera works great on home system recently installed.  It sees everything all the time day or night. Intruders BEWARE !

Reviews.Title: These are a wonderful addition to the Uniden G456 2-pack which only comes originally with 2 camaras.
Reviews.Author: Grady Nelson
Reviews.Content: Our small business is only open from 6 AM to 6 PM. Concerned about after hour break-ins we bought the original 2 camera system from a local membership warehouse but they did not sell extra cameras, in spite of the fact that the system was designed for 4 cameras. We (my business partner and I) searched all around out local hardware outlets for 2 more cameras to no avail. We also called Uniden they did have then in stock either. So we finally found them on Amazon. We now have a 4 camera system. The 2 from Amazon had no problem pairing with the system's home base and once mounted they gave us a better 360 degree view all around our outside office building. These camera are truly waterproof. These 2 were placed at our loading dock where surrounding business have had break-ins. They record any motion to the wireless base station. for later viewing and playback Works beautifully, don't have to be manually be monitored, Cameras have night vision Space is limited here  I'll end by simply saying :"Great Value" they work better than described.

Reviews.Title: Works great wide view and solid detail in video
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Added two of these to a recently bought Uniden Guardian Surveillance system and are very pleased with capability of these cameras.easy to install just plug into power and sync with base  & ready to roll. Base has lighting and sensitivity adjustments and we get great quality pictures and video can be monitored while away by computer of iphones too. Sound level not great but really a secondary reason for the camera. Hoping software updates can improve sound quality in future..

Reviews.Title: Love these cameras
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I have these at both my homes.  I am very pleased with the quality of the video.  I can log on to my phone from anywhere and see what is happening.  The night vision quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Tanis
Reviews.Content: I have the whole system & highly recommend.  It is super easy to set up. The picture is very clear & the night vision is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Cheap way to protect your investments
Reviews.Author: Mitchell Greene
Reviews.Content: I have 4 camera's that I can moniter from my phone anywhere I have phone service.It is really an inexpensive way to protect my investments even when I'm out of town.The video is great day and night!

Reviews.Title: Poor Reception
Reviews.Author: patrick sicilio
Reviews.Content: I Called Uniden they told me in 6 weeks they will be selling a larger antenna.. Very poor reception from an outside camera 50ft. fromthe unit.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as I expected
Reviews.Author: DANIEL HARRELL
Reviews.Content: Video is a little blurry Difficult to set up recording and can only record for short amount of time Problems connecting with the cameras from my iPad and iPhone This is an okay product for the price just not what I thought it was getting.

Reviews.Title: was easy to set up
Reviews.Author: Roy Kasenchak
Reviews.Content: right out of the box I was able to attach the camera to the monitor.  the picture during the day is 95% clear.  the night vision was a little blurry at times but overall acceptable.  this is my first security system and it accomplishes the needs I have to be able to watch my home.

Reviews.Title: GC45
Reviews.Author: ginomari "Gadgeteer"
Reviews.Content: I needed to expand my system with a 3rd camera but amazon was out of stock last week. So I ordered straight from Uniden, $129 plus tax and shipping. Received the camera via Fedex. An hour after I received the shipment, had to go to Fry's for errands and poor me, happen to swing by the camera section and I saw this GC45 for $110. OBTW, everytime you call their customer support, the voicemail starts with "Due to circumstances beyond our control, we are unable to assisst you at this time. Please visit our website at [...]". Customer service is extremely poor.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Cameras are good and clear. The problem is the software. The motion sensors are to sensitive. its constantly recording nothing. leaves in the yard i guess? The only way I found to delete all the 2 and 3 min recordings easily (which  there are a million of in one day) is to reformat the SD card. Deleting one at a time takes forever. There is no time stamping on the recording. So you have no clue when things were recorded. Probably would not buy it if I knew I would have all these problems.

Reviews.Title: POOOOR signal
Reviews.Author: Gibb
Reviews.Content: Poor signal from camera. Placed camera 35 feet from monitor. Customer service poor, weight time to speak o Tech was 34 minutes.

Reviews.Title: Not Mac friendly
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: iPhone app for this product is terrible. They have put all their money in PC instead of making it Mac friendly. Wished I had known that before purchasing and installing.

Reviews.Title: Great addition to my system
Reviews.Author: JOHN P.
Reviews.Content: I owned two cameras already and having spent several months with their use I found the price for expanding the system a true value.  The system itself is effective in providing a degree of security to areas of my home where visual observation is awkward or generally unavailable.  These cameras are as easy as it gets to install, and although not the super high powered instrument available at a significantly higher price and time investment, get the job done to my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Uniden GC45
Reviews.Author: Wazzy
Reviews.Content: Overall the camera is great, along with the system as a whole. The only reason I rated as a 4 and not 5 is due to motion detection. I have one of the four cameras located outside. The smallest thing will set it off and record (insects). It activates all the time and uses up the memory card quickly. There is a setting for the camera (low / high sensitivity) however it doesnt matter as I have tried both. Do not place camera outside near a light because the light attracts insects which will cause you problems. Of the hundreds of recordings reviewed, I always see a fly walking or flying on or near the camera. Frustrating however the system and cameras are an awsome choice for a DIY.

Reviews.Title: Uniden rocks for wireless camera
Reviews.Author: L. Weeks
Reviews.Content: Very clear color and good night vision with in 20 feet. The only improvement I would like have is better distance.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: VerifiedPurchaser63
Reviews.Content: Easy to pair and add to system. Comes with extension cord so you don't have to purchase one.  Took five minutes to set up after getting them to power.  Now have four cameras and loving it.

Reviews.Title: great image low or bright lighting
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Holley "CHUCK"
Reviews.Content: Easy hook up,I did add 32GB micro card for longer recording time.I did also add 2 more cameras giving me 4 total.Great value

Reviews.Title: Uniden GC45W
Reviews.Author: Ken Wong
Reviews.Content: This GC45 in white is difficult to be fixed in position compared to the black model.  Other than that everything is fine.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Wireless surveillance camera
Reviews.Author: T. Bussabarger "Coca Cola Girl"
Reviews.Content: This works booth inside or out. Great to see what is going on outside your home. Clear as a bell.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install, works as advertised.
Reviews.Author: Marlin
Reviews.Content: Easy installation. Perfect for my application.  Syncing with main system was flawless. Able to easily access and review regardless of where I am.

Reviews.Title: Easy to setup
Reviews.Author: C. Brown
Reviews.Content: Brought 2 to go with my guardian system. They work very well , even when the temp got down to -45  to my surprised they kept working with no problems .

Reviews.Title: Uniden camera
Reviews.Author: John McShane
Reviews.Content: Very nice for the price the only problem I have is my unit does not post the date and time on any recordings however that is not the cameras fault but the controller itself  the camera is very exceptional

Reviews.Title: Purchased an extra for my system.
Reviews.Author: Noble1
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Uniden Guardian G755 system and it came with two cameras but is expandable to up to 4 cameras.  this is the 3rd and I will probably get a 4th soon.  The cameras and the surveillance system work great and nice that these are outdoor and weather cameras too.

Reviews.Title: Good quality camera.
Reviews.Author: VP2010
Reviews.Content: Product is brand new and working great.Delivery is on time as expected.i would order again in the future if another one is needed.

Reviews.Title: Should only receive what you pay for....
Reviews.Author: Brianna
Reviews.Content: Although I ordered new cameras, I received 1 that was used, still worked, but not as well for obvious reasons:0(

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: maggie
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised.  Easy to set up and use would recommend for home or small business needs.  Needs easier instructions for various settings however. I like to view from I phone

Reviews.Title: Uniden Camera works as advertised
Reviews.Author: R ALLEN CECCHINE
Reviews.Content: Works pretty well. quality is very good in doors, and outdoors during daylight. Night time infrared is good. On down side is at night cannot make out peoples faces.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Jim larson
Reviews.Content: Easy to find and buy at a good price.  Looked all over town for one and could never find them. Searched for a few seconds on amazon and found it easily at a fair price.  So easy.

Reviews.Title: Motion Detection To Sensitive
Reviews.Author: JENNIFER
Reviews.Content: These cameras look good but the motion detection needs to get better. It records when the trees move and shadows occur, bugs fly around. I would say to sensitive but really needs better technology to know when it is a person, animal and so on. Mine records constantly and is a bit of a pain to go through all the 2 minute videos. Easy set up though, overall good for the money. I just think they can do better on the motion detection. :-)

Reviews.Title: Easy Install
Reviews.Author: Winton Young
Reviews.Content: Camera pairs easily with the monitor that comes in the kit that comes with only 2 cameras.  Mounting is easy but limited to the location of a power outlet.  Unfortunately the resolution is not sharp.  I can make out license plates at most 20-25 feet.  Beyond that they cannot be made out.  The same with faces on people.  The cameras are visible day and night and will be deterrents in themselves.

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff!
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: These are great, easy to install.  I bought these as extras to my existing kit.  I like the system, does really well.  Clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Great system and cheap
Reviews.Author: David Hanson
Reviews.Content: Works great and I was surprised how well the signal goes around the corners of the house and through doors.  The fixed focus does not provide a really clear image but do you really want to sit there and focus your cameras on things?  Hooked up great to my iPhone and iPad.  With my wireless Internet connection, can view what's going on from anyplace.  A quality buy, if you're willing to give up the high definition offered by other systems.  Recording features are excellent.  Easy to set up but you should do some thinking about where you place your cameras, as they need to be within 10 to 12 feet of an outlet.  Works well indoors or outdoors.  Different motion detection sensitivities for each camera comes in handy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Rob Ramiza
Reviews.Content: These work awesome have them set up in our barn now we can keep an eye on everybody from home in the house and from work

Reviews.Title: Very nice system
Reviews.Author: Louie
Reviews.Content: We purchased the g755 (2 camera model) then bought two more cameras to complete the 4 camera system.  I would recommend this product with our haste although email notification and records based on movement detection is a bit of a joke.  I have 3 of the cameras outside in the backyard and I get emails all day long as my pools, palms & often detected bugs are always setting it off.  So I get spammed all day.Other then that I am considering getting a second system for the front yard. One more thing, remove accessibility is nice but the mobile software needs some updating and care.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: It is top quality. I needed 2 more so I went online and searched it up and this came up it was cheaper then when u go on to their website but works the same

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: D HENDERSON
Reviews.Content: Everything works great from the start...really easy to set up and use and a good value...also has automatic IR at night.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Weather Proof Video Surveillance Camera, White (GC45W)
Reviews.Author: Rawker
Reviews.Content: Tips seemed to be simple enough to follow through. Except upgrading from the internet seemed to be a problem. Still trying to figure it out somehow.

Reviews.Title: Trusteble
Reviews.Author: Edgard O Junior
Reviews.Content: Good and work very well with Uniden system.  i like it so much.  And I had a complet set that works well.

Reviews.Title: G955 system came with 2 cameras, bought 2 more !
Reviews.Author: Don K.
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with these cameras, placed 2 in the house, 2 outside. Good reception, E-mail alerts work fine, easy set up.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: For what they are camera is great works well and I have no range issues, if your looking for an affordable system to keep an eye on your home this is it.

Reviews.Title: Camera GC45
Reviews.Author: randi fundaro
Reviews.Content: The cameras work fine. They are easy to install and synchronize. They provide a good color image.  The imaging doesn't provide the best clarity but is acceptable.

Reviews.Title: If you wanted a surveillance camera - this is the one to have, plus it is wireless and has no interference.
Reviews.Author: Gary Folck
Reviews.Content: This product is exceptional.  I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking to buy a surveillance Camera.I have had several surveillance cameras over the years - the problem is clarity, focus, interference, and not being able to see in the darkness.This camera meets all my expectations and then some.  And in addition to all what I mentioned you can access it from the internet, cell phone, etc. and see what ever is happening plus it is recordable.The clarity is exceptional as well as being able to see in the Dark hours.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Camera GC45W
Reviews.Author: Earl Lee Cooper Jr.
Reviews.Content: The camera was an excellent addition to my existing system. Very easy to pair and install. Also was weather proof which makes the location an outstand part of the setup location. Thanks !!!!

Reviews.Title: Uniden GC45 Camera - Excellent
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: For the price you can not beat it.  This is my 3rd GC45 unit.  Have 2 outside and one in the garage.  I finally found out what was turning on my outdoor lights at 3AM!!!! CATS!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great cameras
Reviews.Author: Wayne King
Reviews.Content: I bought this to add to my existing Uniden system. It was installed in minutes and pairing with the system was immediate.For the money the Uniden Guardian 2 setup is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Love this system
Reviews.Author: Godaddygo
Reviews.Content: These security cameras are great!  Have amazing night vision capabilities.  Recently, I recorded someone walking a dog in front of my house in total darkness, amazing clarity.

Reviews.Title: Overall, product is alright
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Jones
Reviews.Content: Overall,  good system for the money.  However, it does have a few issues.  For instance, motion sensors on "low" are still too sensitive to changes in lighting.  Car headlights nearby and small bugs will trigger recording.  The red and green indicator lights on the front of the cameras are not very practical for outdoor use.  Spiders will build webs in front of the lights to catch bugs, setting off the camera in the process.  Also, the frames per second are not consistent, even when the base is stationary and wireless signals are good.  Wireless does interfere with home network, which tends to be an issue when you stream television shows.  And I wish it recorded sound.  I dont understand why it doesnt.  It is capable of doing so.  But other than that, the product performs as advertised.

Reviews.Title: We are very happy with the product....
Reviews.Author: Eliza Bunney
Reviews.Content: They were easy sync to our system and work great with our other cameras. No problems at all. We were very happy with the price and are beyond pleased with the product!

Reviews.Title: This camera works well
Reviews.Author: R. lynch
Reviews.Content: This camera works well, I like it when things work well. People who work well wont mind spending money on things that work well. Oh yeah, the night vision works well too.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Big j
Reviews.Content: Great cam and system for my needs turn it on and let workI would tell friends to buy thanks

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Billy
Reviews.Content: Perfect! Works great does everything it said it would do. I will prob buy a 4th one for my system.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: udi
Reviews.Content: Very good product and easy to install. I loved it in the busyness or home it answered all my needs. I was very happy to see it in the market.

Reviews.Title: This white camera has not a metal body, it's plastic, be aware.
Reviews.Author: MD paused "MD paused"
Reviews.Content: How is it going to last in the weather elements.Setup was simple3 stars for being plastic otherwise 4 stars

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: dan PERRY
Reviews.Content: FOR THE PRICE AND EASY SET UP GREAT. AND EASY REVIEW OF DAILY IMAGES.BUT POOR RESOLUTION OF RECORDED IMAGES. GOOD DAY!

Reviews.Title: Excellent so far
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Bell
Reviews.Content: For the money the surveillance camera is fine.  It's a little "busy" hanging off the rafters so they're mounted as inconspicuously as possible.  The trade off is distance.

Reviews.Title: Works great  real nice picture
Reviews.Author: donald marotzke
Reviews.Content: this is a great addition to my uniden security system, these cameras work in the rain, the dark, even at 35 below zero, I highly recommend adding another camera to your uniden security system if you dont already have 4, its quick and easy,

Reviews.Title: The Uniden Wireless weather proof video surveilliance camera
Reviews.Author: Fernando L. Arroyo
Reviews.Content: The Uniden Wireless weather proof video surveillance camera it is very helpful for the overall security of my home inside and outside.

Reviews.Title: Uniden Wireless Camera
Reviews.Author: Griz
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I needed for the home.  Quick response, easy installation.  Now I can watch the house from my Iphone even if I'm not at home.

Reviews.Title: installation and operation are very easy
Reviews.Author: Roberto Kelly
Reviews.Content: the camera's were easy to install and easy to put in operatation.  we have a clear picture and remote access is a great feature.

Reviews.Title: best camera for the money
Reviews.Author: steve kosinski
Reviews.Content: exactly what a small business needs for seccurity and remote monitoring.  easy to relocate as needs change.  good image on recirding device.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras
Reviews.Author: Jeff Gourson
Reviews.Content: There easy to use & dependable also easy to access via the cell phone. In the process of 2 more.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: michelle woodward
Reviews.Content: Great just what I wanted.So very glad I check on line for more cameras.I think extra cameras should be offer in stores

Reviews.Title: Great camera.
Reviews.Author: aahluvscritters
Reviews.Content: Came with everything you need to install.  Set up and working in less than a day.  We have four covering our home/business and they work great.

Reviews.Title: Surveillance cameras (Uniden system)
Reviews.Author: kevin willetts
Reviews.Content: We purchased the 3rd & 4th cameras to add to our new system purchased at Costco.  But the 4th camera does not seem to have the same connection strength as it goes in and out of connection.  Checked all multiple times, but it may be that the system just can't handle 4 cameras.If you are ok with just wanting to know if someone was around your home while you were out - this is a great system.  Night vision is not that great and any lights (such as headlights) make it impossible to see anything other than bright lights.  System is sensitive - even records when cobweb gets in its way.  But biggest downside is that you can't program times to record - just on or off.  For detail features you'll have to get a more expensive system.  For us, the wireless off-the-shelf system was what we needed!

Reviews.Title: Broken after one day of usage
Reviews.Author: John F
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these as part of a gift to go along with the 7-inch Guardian base system.  Two of the cameras have already broken!  One had a plastic nut on the back that seals the unit break completely off, the other has sever issues with its optics which results in half the picture being a different colour than the other half.  Tapping the camera changes the exact point of where the difference begins.I am very dissappointed with these cameras and the base station that they go with.  I will never buy another product from Uniden.

Reviews.Title: Both of these items FAILED me as soon as I plugged them in
Reviews.Author: WJGBalderama
Reviews.Content: I saw a bright flash on the front of the unit, and then a popping noise like a balloon -- and then it's over. The darn thing don't  work anymore. I tried the other one, and I had the same result. I do not recommend this at all. I need to return these items, but I can't do it as I'm on extended vacation. Should I return them to UNIDEN manufacturer?

Reviews.Title: Simple add-on and truly weatherproof
Reviews.Author: Hien Nguyen "scatterbrained"
Reviews.Content: I added two of these cameras to an existing Uniden Guardian G755 system.  It was extremely simple to add them by pairing them (pressing a button on the power cord of the camera and setting the viewer to add a new camera).After pairing them, I placed one outside on a balcony.  Since they're black, I covered it with white plastic (so it wouldn't absorb too much sun) and it's been going strong for more than 3 months outside in the summer heat and pouring rain!The picture is decent and the infrared is strong enough to let me see clearly in the dark.  The camera is mounted on my balcony railing pointing downward towards the front door.So in total, all four of my cameras have now been working perfectly for three to nine months with no issues!

Reviews.Title: Decent performer
Reviews.Author: battistta "battistta"
Reviews.Content: The cameras are sturdy, but made in China.  I don't know how long they will last.  I hope they are not as disposable as much of the Chinese products I end up purchasing because the last thing any manufacturer wants us to know is that their product is Chinese.  Nevertheless, the cameras were extras to complete a set.  I wish the cameras were stronger and have more focus.  The human images from 30 feet away are blurry at best.  The cameras work well outdoors but they need to be installed rather close to the hole bringing the power cable into the building if installed outdoors.  Had some trouble "syncing" the camera with the receiver, but after 15 to 20 minutes of trying it worked.  It can be frustrating if you are installing yourself and it is a tight fit.  I recommend "syncing" before installing.  If installed on a second floor, the cameras may be more useful as a deterrent rather than a camera to record evidence that can be tied to a particular person, as their face is likely to be unrecognizable. I like the "wireless" feature as it allows the receiver to be virtually anywhere in the building with reception.  The plus for the wireless is that you need less than professional installation as you do not need to wire your house up.  The cameras also have a sound feature, but is only for live feed, it does not actually seem to record sound.  The internet feature, and email notifications, are also very nifty but it takes some work to get it to work well.  Overall, I hope they are worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Great Service and Product
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Brimhall
Reviews.Content: Great for home surveillance, image is blurry if the person moves too quickly, but still okay for identifying people.  Sound and recording features make it perfect for our application, which is home security and one camera for a baby monitor.  Fast shipping.

Reviews.Title: Supreme home surveilance!
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  It's small, well-built, and very functional in providing images, day & night.  Also does an audio feed.  As well as motion-detection recording.  And it's wireless, not requiring a DVR.

Reviews.Title: Good, solid camera
Reviews.Author: AMO Bulldog
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  A little pricey but it does the job and I was able to get 4 cameras set up all around my house with very little trouble.,

Reviews.Title: video
Reviews.Author: Sandy Tubbs
Reviews.Content: Super easy install and change viewing direction.  Day vision is great. Night works ok but make sure not next to glass or the reflection will hinder view

Reviews.Title: Good product/
Reviews.Author: Sheldon Stovall
Reviews.Content: A very good product but the cords that must be plugged into an electric outlet are too short and don't reach!

Reviews.Title: GC45W
Reviews.Author: jerry bryan
Reviews.Content: Have not been able to get much use of it since I had to send back the monitor unit of one of my sets to be repaired. All in all it works great. thanks.

Reviews.Title: The camera worked as expected
Reviews.Author: Debra Gordon
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the camera and very happy with how easy it was to pair it with my current system . It works well and has very clear reception.

Reviews.Title: So far, so good !
Reviews.Author: George L. Hall
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera a week ago and so far, so good. it came as described ON TIME with no problems. Its working good and I hope to have it for years to come !

Reviews.Title: Uniden Weather Proof Video Surveillance Camera
Reviews.Author: Helen Lanning
Reviews.Content: A person can't be too careful and these cameras are durable and do a fantastic job. In fact we are going to order another one.

Reviews.Title: Worked great
Reviews.Author: IlliniGldbear
Reviews.Content: Provides nice view of the room where it was positioned. It even worked in low light situation at night in dark room.

Reviews.Title: information
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: i like to know this model GC45 is compatible with uniden guardian G-766 Wire Less wi fi i want to be sure before order more cameras...i wait for your answer.. tanck you

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Bestone
Reviews.Content: i got the cameras about a 1 month ago they work GREAT i'm glad i got them and will buy them again

Reviews.Title: uniden cameras
Reviews.Author: Josie Karam
Reviews.Content: I have not used them yet, but they arrived in very good condition and I was able to pair them with my monitor.

Reviews.Title: Not really thrilled.
Reviews.Author: Emu
Reviews.Content: We bought the unit at Costco.  But, my husband wanted more cameras.  So, we purchased two more from you and one of them apparently isn't working.  It's a big deal with my husband because we have 4 cameras with only 3 working.

Reviews.Title: FAST SERVICE!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Robert R Dinneweth
Reviews.Content: In the process of compairing them with other cameras I have used.So far they are of better quality and easy to operate.

Reviews.Title: I like this camera
Reviews.Author: Jianwei Li
Reviews.Content: I love this camera because it fits exactly what I needs. I just need a simple security system to monitor my house, and I don't want to spend a lot of money. It is easy to install, and has ll the features I want.

Reviews.Title: security performance
Reviews.Author: philipa
Reviews.Content: This item is performing reasonably well, although I have been having a problem with the software allowing viewing and recording on my computer. I contacted Uniden, but haven't received an answer yet.

ProductInfo.Features:
Weather proof camera works in almost all weather conditions
Works with the G455 Surveillance System
Gives you crisp, clear pictures
ProductInfo.Name: Uniden Weather Proof Video Surveillance Camera, White (GC45W)
